rules_text:
The Kingdom of Hope enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
{4}{W}, {T}: Transform The Kingdom of Hope. Activate only as a sorcery.
rules_text2:
When this land transforms into Arcadia, you gain 5 life.
{T}: Add two mana of any one color.
flavor_text2: [i]Arcadia's champions are charged with protecting humanity and spreading hope, making the Kingdom ever more glorious.[/i]
